title: Can't move character, or do anything in game
body: Loaded into a game and couldn't press anything. Shop wouldn't open, couldn't move, couldn't learn skills, couldn't type in chat, couldn't open options. My friend is having the exact same problem. We made a custom game after and it still doesn't work. Checked ping and packet loss, nothing seems to be an issue there. What's going on !

replies.body:
It sounds like you and your friend were maybe on the same network when you were having these issues? If so, this does actually sound quite a lot like packet loss. 

If you don't mind, go ahead and run a traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post those results here so I can take a look at how the health of your connection is faring when it leaves your network.
I'm about to lose a ranked game because of this bug. It's my provisionals.  It's your fault. You have to refund me for this loss.

Generally, it's a better practice to troubleshoot solutions to these problems before going back into ranked, because we can't undo losses you sustain because of these. It's every player's responsibility to ensure they can play without interruptions or technical problems, both for their sake and their teams! 

Please be sure to try that traceroute, otherwise, it'll be hard for us to narrow down the main problem and give appropriate steps to help you out!
I'm currently having the exact same thing happen to me and it has absolutely nothing to do with my internet.

Sounds like the same problem I had, which is also being reported (in a different way) in other threads here. In our cases it was Discord and the Discord overlay. Either kill Discord or turn off the Discord overlay, that fixed it for me.
I had the same problem and could only solve it by reinstalling the game. 5 days later, I gotta reinstall again :D

That thing happen today and i couldnt do nothing just look how time was going ..... RIOT please give a solution , i want to play . The problem isnt our connection its yours because i see more than 1 person saying this.
same thing happened with me.  literally nothing wrong with my internet.  i better not get punished for this

The same thing is happening to me right now. I thought it was maybe from the new patch but people have been experiencing it from weeks ago. Has anyone found a solution. It definitely isn't my internet either.
Currently having the same issue, extremely annoying knowing I'm the cause of my team losing and I can't do a thing about it.
I have the same problem too... OMG!
I'm having the same problem in my ranked game right now. I hope riot compensates me.
